column5: Anyone play these games?  I have Most of them, but i am missing the African Adventure and Legandary hunts, Are they as good as the other ones?
I used to on Windows 98, they were okay, everything worked, on XP Home or Pro, nothing works right, so they are now jewel box frizbies.

I play them on my Ps2 system.. sofar the Cabelas Outdoor Adventure is the best one..The game play is really good once you get the hang of it. I love calling in the animals with the different calls/ antlers/ sents. The duck hunting is really fun too.
